item.title: Can You Ace This Quiz to Prove You Know How to Spell 'Friday'?
item.description: I. Introduction It’s Friday! We’ve all been looking forward to the weekend, but do you know how to spell the word “Friday”? Take this quiz to find out! II. Questions Is the word “Friday” spelled with an “e” or an “i”? Does the word “Friday” contain two “d"s or one? Is the word “Friday” spelled with an “a” or an “e”? III. Conclusion Now that you’ve taken this quiz, you should have a better understanding of how to spell the word “Friday”.
